description.raw:
With certain variants of the `default` branch (such as pull request #2796) I get the following error:

~~~
CMakeFiles/gz.dir/gz.cc.o: In function `gazebo::ModelCommand::ProcessSpawn(std::shared_ptr<sdf::SDF>, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&, ignition::math::Pose3<double> const&, boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::transport::Node>)':
/media/louise/TERA/code/gazeboA/tools/gz.cc:571: undefined reference to `sdf::Element::GetAttribute(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
tools/CMakeFiles/gz.dir/build.make:264: recipe for target 'tools/gz-9.0.1' failed
make[2]: *** [tools/gz-9.0.1] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:11769: recipe for target 'tools/CMakeFiles/gz.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [tools/CMakeFiles/gz.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:160: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
~~~

Not sure why it doesn't happen on the default branch itself, but in any case, this PR fixes the issue.

CMakeFiles/gz.dir/gz.cc.o: In function `gazebo::ModelCommand::ProcessSpawn(std::shared_ptr<sdf::SDF>, std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&, ignition::math::Pose3<double> const&, boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::transport::Node>)':

Not sure why it doesn't happen on the default branch itself, but in any case, this PR fixes the issue.
